The repeater covers all of Santa Fe, Los Alamos, Madrid, and much more. 3 Miles West of Santa Fe, NM. 6,870 Feet Elevation. 50 watt Hytera RD985 Repeater. Dual Mix with Analog, PL 131.8. Decibel Products DB-408 omni pattern antenna. Antenna height is 85 feet above ground level. On the air June 24, 2019. (Lat 35.678711 Long -105.991646)
